analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: “Nayidaṁ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṁ vussati janakuhanatthaṁ, na janalapanatthaṁ, na lābhasakkārasilokānisaṁsatthaṁ, na ‘iti maṁ jano jānātū’ti.
analyzed: na yida bhikkhave brahmacariyam vussati jana kuhanattha na jana lapanattha na lābha sakkāra silokānisasattha na iti mama janaḥ jānātu uti

original: Atha kho idaṁ, bhikkhave, brahmacariyaṁ vussati saṁvaratthañceva pahānatthañcā”ti.
analyzed: atha kho idam bhikkhave brahmacariyam vussati savara attham ca iva pahāna attham ca ati

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
